caption:
“Grace follows the wanderer.”

Reflection:
However far we roam, mercy keeps pace. The lost road is never truly lost.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that divine love is relentless. Grace is the traveler’s shadow — constant, patient, and guiding us home.
